thread.title_full: Nelly is returning to the UK for a one-off show in December - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Nelly is returning to the UK for a one-off show in December - Music
text: Nelly is returning to the UK for a one-off show at the end of the year.The rapper will perform at London's Koko as part of his 'The Fix Tour' on Monday, December 14. Tickets for the show go on sale at 9am on Friday, October 23. They are priced at Â£28.50.Nelly has achieved great success in his career, having hits with the likes of 'Dilemma', 'Hot in Herre' and 'Just a Dream'.He has released seven studio albums, the most recent being 2013's MO.Elsewhere, the rapper was arrested on drug charges in Tennessee earlier this year.Watch the music video for Nelly and Kelly Rowland's hit 'Dilemma' below:
